game.name: Mondial
game.description: Discover interesting facts about countries of the world by exploring a model that conforms to the metamodel below. As you progress through the levels of the game, more details of the metamodel will be revealed to you. Use the Model Explorer to query the model with EOL and answer the questions on the right!

level.description: Let's get warmed up. The world consists of countries, many countries.
level.question: How many countries are there really in the world?
level.hint: // We'll give you this one Country.all.size().println();
level.solution: // We'll give you this one Country.all.size().println();

level.description: As you probably already know, each country has a name.
level.question: How many countries have names that start with the letter "A"?

level.description: Let's play a bit more with names.
level.question: How many countries have names which start and end with the same letter?

level.description: Countries are encompassed in continents. Some countries are encompassed in more than one continents (for example Russia belongs both to Europe and to Asia).
level.question: How many countries belong to more than 1 continents?
How many countries belong (even partly) to Asia?
Which country has the fewest inhabitants?
Which country occupies the smallest area?
Which is the most densely populated country?

level.description: Most countries have borders with other countries.
level.question: Which is the most densely populated country?
